  • App link
  1. Settings
  2. Preloader color

Colors

You need to choose a color when creating or editing a preloader.

Available settings:

  1. Color (with a possibility to use gradient);

  2. Fill type;

  3. Fill direction.

  1. To add a color, left-click on any area of the color scale (by default, it is painted as a chessboard, there is no color).
    Markers with “anchors” in the lower part will appear. Left-click on them on to select a color. Color can be removed at any time by clicking on the cross at the top of the marker.

  2. You can choose from 4 fill types:
    • Radial
    • Linear
    • Repeating radial
    • Repeating linear
  3. You can also choose a direction for each type.
    • Radial
      top right center left bottom
    • Linear
      top right center left bottom
    • Repeating radial
      top right center left bottom
    • Repeating linear
      top right center left bottom
